options.name: Reaction : Spell of Opportunity
options.description: In response to a Hostile Creature leaving your Area of Control, you Channel a 1 Action Touch Spell against the Target.

options.name: Free Action : Mobile Casting
options.description: After using the Channel Action to complete a Spell, you move 2 Units as part of that Action.

options.name: Amplified Force
options.description: Your Ray and Projectile Spells deal unavoidable Splash Damage to Creatures that are Adjacent to your initial Target

options.name: Action : High Velocity Magic
options.description: You Channel a Ray or Projectile Spell that takes 1 Action and gain a 1d4 Bonus to the Spell Attack Check. Additionally, the Range of the Spell is doubled and is not affected by Cover.
